name: Dev: Dogs. Electricity. Spray Paint.
description:
F - Fullscreen

Enter/Start - Pause

Tab - Super Useful Map

DOGS.

Play as Dev, the hip radical teenage dog who's got a penchant for trouble.

ELECTRICITY.

Meet the electrically charged goons of an unknown figure head, and get wrapped up in an all out war.

SPRAY PAINT.

Spray your enemies, tag anything, and kick the $#@! out of brainwashed goons.

FEATURES:

Twin stick controls for Keyboard and Gamepad

Colorful cast of characters waiting for you to meet them

Dummies to practice your technique

Short playtime. It's a Jam game, what'd you expect?

Follow the Buddies!

(Get it? Buddy Jam?)

K. Grun, Artist Ashton Arnold, Developer
